lines.gurmukhi: jYsy mDu mwKI sIic sIic kY iekqR krY; hrY mDU Awieqw ky muiK Cwru fwir kY [

Unknown.translation: Just as honey bee hops from flower to flower and collects honey, but a honey collector smokes the bees away, and takes the honey.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ Shd dI m`KI sMc sMc ky ikDroˆ dw ikDry ilAw ilAw Shd nUM iek`iTAwˆ krdI hY, qy Shd coxhwrw Es dy mUMh ivc suAwh pw ky lu`t iljwieAw krdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy bC hyq gaU sMcq hY KIr; qwih lyq hY AhIru duih bCry ibfwir kY [

Unknown.translation: Just as a cow collects milk in her teats for the calf, but a milkman uses the calf to bring down her milk. He ties the calf away, milks the cow and takes it away.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ gaU v`Cy vwsqy du`D nUM sMicAw sMgRh kIqw krdI hY, pr psm pYx qy v`Cy nUM pry htw ky gujr Awp du`D nUM co ilAw krdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy Dr Koid Koid kir ibl swjY mUsw; pYsq srpu Dwie Kwie qwih mwir kY [

Unknown.translation: Just as a rodent digs up earth to make a burrow but a snake enters the burrow and eats away the rodent.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ DrqI nUM pu`t pu`t ky cUhw Ku`f bxwieAw krdw hY, pr auQy Es nUM mwr ky Kwky s`p dOiVAw dOiVAw Awn DisAw krdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy koit pwp kir mwieAw joir joir mUV; AMiq kwil Cwif clY dono kr Jwir kY [555[

Unknown.translation: Similarly an ignorant and foolish person indulges in umpteen sins, collects wealth and leaves this world empty-handed. (All his earnings and material goods prove worthless ultimately).  (555)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: iqsI pRkwr mUrK pwp ApRwD kr kr ky mwXw dw joV sMcX joVdw hY, pr EVk nUM dovyˆ h`Q hI JwV ky KwlI h`Q kUc kr jwieAw krdw hY ]555]
